'''The Breakthrough''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to destroy the sparkling rocks using the [[Ruin Golem (Valley of Dahri)|Ruin Golem]] in the Valley of Dahri, which is unlocked during the World Quest ''[[Afratu's Dilemma]]''.
